text: When My Baby Smiles at Me is a 1948 American musical movie directed by Walter Lang and is the third adaption of the 1927 play Burlesque. It stars Betty Grable, Dan Dailey, Jack Oakie, June Havoc, Richard Arlen, James Gleason and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1949. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1948 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Walter Lang
title: When My Baby Smiles at Me
